thread.title: When Kangana Ranaut wrote a letter to Shahid Kapoor’s wife Mira | Hindi Movie News
thread.title_full: When Kangana Ranaut wrote a letter to Shahid Kapoor’s wife Mira | Hindi Movie News - Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: When Kangana Ranaut wrote a letter to Shahid Kapoor’s wife Mira | Hindi Movie News
text:
Recently, Shahid Kapoor 's wife, Mira hosted a beautiful pre-birthday bash for her darling husband. Many close friends and A-listers from the film fraternity were invited for the bash. However, Kangana Ranaut was missing from the party. Since the actress is Shahid's co-star in 'Rangoon', her absence raised a few eyebrows.
Kangana Ranaut: 'Rangoon' role not based on anybody living or dead Actress Kangana Ranaut, whose character in the forthcoming film 'Rangoon' is said to be loosely based on actress-stunt woman Fearless Nadia, says her role is not based on any real-life person.
While she may not have been able to make it to the bash, she made it up to Mira with a sweet gesture. The 'Rangoon' actress reportedly wrote a letter to the star wife thanking her for inviting her to the celebration. Apparently, Kangana further explained that she would not be able to attend the party as she will be caught up with some prior commitments in Delhi around that time. Isn't that sweet of Kangana?
Kangana Ranaut turns perfectionist 02:37
